question: [Review] Francais: Calculez l'aire et le perimetre du triangle forme par (84, 153), (152, 138), (201, 40).

qas.question: [Review] Francais: Calculez l'aire et le perimetre du triangle forme par (84, 153), (152, 138), (201, 40).
[Brief] Svenska: Berakna arean och omkretsen for triangeln med (84, 153), (152, 138), (201, 40). Provide only the area.
[Check] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (84, 153), (152, 138), (201, 40). Provide only the perimeter.
